summary: Provides core configuration and utility functions for a solute transport simulation, handling problem definition, boundary and initial condition specification, step size calculation, massâ€‘balance preparation, and result reporting.
business_intent: Enables users to set up and run reliable contaminant transport models by encapsulating the essential parameters (boundary types, initial concentrations, porosity, species count, etc.) and automating routine tasks needed for accurate and efficient simulation of solute movement in porous media.
